description:
Holy crap this dude is smoldering hot!
Ok, so yeah, he's got some crazy tatts going on, but his body is amazing, and you can tell he just loves being on film!
Jagger is about a quarter Asian (The Asian gene is very strong btw) so even though he has a kiss of it, it enough to give him a totally unique and exotic vibe.
He works out with body builders, does Jiu-Jitsu, and basically is a super-friendly bad ass.
Here is another dude that seems to be nervous about working with guys, but realizes his look is more marketable to a male audience than a straight audience. So he is definitely thinking of trying more scenes. Though he did request to take his time.
The boy has an amazing look, so I am super pleased to be bringing him to you!
title: Jagger - Solo
